results.deck: Indie Assault is an ESports geared platform fighting game developed by Imagination Vent.
results.name: Indie Assault

results.deck: Soul Axiom is a futuristic first-person adventure game from Wales Interactive.
results.name: Soul Axiom

results.deck: Heather “Athena” Quinn must run through various styles of first-person shooters in her quest to get back home. Based on a book by the same name.
results.name: Bedlam

results.deck: A prequel to the whole Yakuza series set in 1988, starring a young Kazuma Kiryu and Goro Majima in the lead roles.
results.name: Yakuza 0

results.deck: Minigame collection themed around various personality traits, tied together by a story several individuals' search for a mysterious artifact.
results.name: Pillar

results.deck: An arcade-puzzle game developed by Unfinished Pixel.
results.name: Spy Chameleon RGB Agent

results.deck: The guy who played Randal in Clerks plays another guy named Randal in this point-and-click adventure game from Daedalic Entertainment and Nexus Game Studios.
results.name: Randal's Monday

results.deck: Wild Season is an RPG, Farming, Life, Simulation Game developed by Quickfire Games. The game revolves around how the main character must manage & mantain a farm, while dealing with the trappings of every day farm life and the end of the world.
results.name: Wild Season

results.deck: A Lacrosse simulation game coming to PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC.
results.name: Lacrosse 15

results.deck: Koei-Tecmo's One Piece action-brawler series reaches its third installment and marks the series' debut on PlayStation 4 and PC.
results.name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 3

results.deck: Side-scrolling 2D action RPG about a sailor shipwrecked on a mysterious island.
results.name: Salt and Sanctuary

results.deck: A co-op action RPG with a randomly generated world and adventure levels.
results.name: Moon Hunters

results.deck: A monster collecting game in the style of Pokemon Red & Blue.
results.name: Collectems

results.deck: When The Boss is captured by Satan, it's up to Johnny Gat and Kenzie Kensington to cause as much chaos as possible in Hell to rescue them in this standalone expansion to Saints Row IV.
results.name: Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell

results.deck: A yoga action platformer utilizing the Kinect and PlayStation Camera.
results.name: Commander Cherry's Puzzled Journey

results.deck: A 3D Action/RPG where you play as Akara, a female warrior determined to destroy the Dark Lords.
results.name: Murasaki Mist: Akara's Journey

results.deck: A party-based action RPG that fuses Norse mythology with magic.
results.name: Kyn

results.deck: A virtual tutor game for PlayStation VR developed on the Unreal Engine 4 by the Tekken Team.
results.name: Summer Lesson

results.deck: Earth Defense Force 4.1 is a remake of Earth Defense Force 2025 for the Playstation 4, featuring new content and remastered visuals.
results.name: Earth Defense Force 4.1: The Shadow of New Despair

results.deck: New Fairy Fencer F game for Playstation 4.
results.name: Fairy Fencer F: Advent Dark Force

results.deck: Redheaded swordsman Adol returns in the eighth entry in Falcom's long running action RPG series where he shares the leading role with a blue haired woman named Dana.
results.name: Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of Dana

results.deck: An expanded version of the sci-fi "hunting action" game God Eater 2, this time leaving the PSP behind in favor of a PS4 version.
results.name: God Eater 2: Rage Burst

results.deck: The busty ninja girls of Senran Kagura burst onto consoles with this hack and slash follow up to Shinovi Versus.
results.name: Senran Kagura: Estival Versus

results.deck: An action RPG spin-off from the Dragon Quest franchise, developed by Dynasty Warriors developer Omega Force.
results.name: Dragon Quest Heroes: The World Tree’s Woe and the Blight Below

results.deck: The Star Wars universe enters the fray as Disney's Infinity platform grows to include a third installment.
results.name: Disney Infinity 3.0 Edition

results.deck: Fibbage is the lying, bluffing, fib-till-you-win trivia party game from the makers of YOU DON’T KNOW JACK!
results.name: Fibbage

results.deck: The Legend of Lobodestroyo vs. La Liga de Los Villanos, or just "Lobodestroyo" for short, is a 3D platformer starring a luchadore wolf.
results.name: The Legend of Lobodestroyo vs. La Liga de Los Villanos

results.deck: A tactical platformer in which players are in search of Aegis, a legendary weapon, to save their village.
results.name: Aegis Defenders

results.deck: Worlds of Magic is a 4X turn-based strategy game from Wastelands Interactive.
results.name: Worlds of Magic

results.deck: The next game in the popular long-running series.
results.name: Dragon Quest XI: Sugisarishi Toki o Motomete

results.deck: An exploration of the impact a single man had on several people's lives.
results.name: Fragments of Him

results.deck: Clap Hanz brings their long-running golf franchise to PlayStation 4.
results.name: New Hot Shots Golf

results.deck: The popular reality show about a family of heavily bearded duck hunters is now a video game from Fun Labs.
results.name: Duck Dynasty

results.deck: Local multiplayer game in the style of Worms.
results.name: Mayan Death Robots

results.deck: Sengoku Hime returns, this time with 85 heroines!
results.name: Sengoku Hime 5: Senka Tatsu Haou no Keifu

results.deck: SteamWorld Heist is a sidescrolling turn-based tactics game in the SteamWorld universe. It takes place many years after the planet in SteamWorld Dig was destroyed.
results.name: SteamWorld Heist

results.deck: A third Sword Art Online game developed by Bandai Namco, this time set in the world of ALfheim Online.
results.name: Sword Art Online: Lost Song

results.deck: A puzzle platformer about a man who wakes up in a basement with no idea who he is other than the word "Klaus" written on his arm
results.name: Klaus

results.deck: Mystery dungeon style roguelike set in the Touhou universe.
results.name: Touhou Genso Wanderer

results.deck: The sequel to Black Forest Games' platformer.
results.name: Giana Sisters 2

results.deck: A puzzle game where the player controls a haunted manor and has to scare the humans who have taken up residence there.
results.name: Poltergeist: A Pixelated Horror

results.deck: Trine 3: Artifacts of Power is the sequel to the sequel to Trine. Partially funded by the EU. This entry will for the first time blend 3D segments with the established 2D gameplay.
results.name: Trine 3: The Artifacts of Power

results.deck: Indie platfomer focused on momentum.
results.name: The Sun and Moon

results.deck: A motorcycle racing game with a heavy focus on bike customization. From the makers of the MotoGP series.
results.name: RIDE

results.deck: Bust a darkslide to a laserflip in the Old West, revert manual your way through a Mayan Jungle, then anti-casper flip into a Sci Fi Robot Future. A superfast 2D skateboarding game set against classic movie backdrops, and all about level long combos and huge trick points.
results.name: OlliOlli 2: Welcome to OlliWood

results.deck: Formula Fusion is a futuristic racing game from R8 Games, which consists of many of the people who developed Wipeout before the closure of SCEE Liverpool.
results.name: Formula Fusion

results.deck: A 2D side-scrolling adventure. Pip can evolve by consuming pixels from defeated enemies.
results.name: Adventures of Pip

results.deck: Procedurally generated side-scrolling brawler about a group of viking raiders.
results.name: Viking Squad

results.deck: Side-scrolling platformer about a eponymous Shu who must escape a deadly storm with the help of the stranded villagers he meets along the way.
results.name: Shu

results.deck: A platforming game that has players using their quarks and reflexes to overcome puzzles.
results.name: Schrödinger's Cat and the Raiders of the Lost Quark

results.deck: The final update to Dead or Alive 5 brings the game to PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. Last Round features more characters, stages, and costumes than any other Dead or Alive game to date.
results.name: Dead or Alive 5 Last Round

results.deck: A cartoony local-multiplayer dual-stick shooter for the PS4
results.name: Fluster Cluck

results.deck: A top­down racing combat game
results.name: BlazeRush

results.deck: A science-fiction game that combines elements of first-person shooters and adventure games.
results.name: Albedo: Eyes from Outer Space

results.deck: A dungeon crawler featuring the Bergson family who arecharged with guarding the sacred Mount Morta.
results.name: Children of Morta

results.deck: The second game based on the Tadeo Jones franchise.
results.name: Tadeo Jones Y El Manuscrito Perdido

results.deck: A rugby game for the 2015 season, containing officially licensed teams and players from several European leagues.
results.name: Rugby 15

results.deck: Upcoming FPS inspired by Minecraft.
results.name: Gunscape

results.deck: Nova 2001 is an arcade shooter released by Universal in 1984.
results.name: Nova 2001

results.deck: A Sci-Fi Action-RPG from co-creators of Diablo and Torchlight, featuring heavy sandbox elements and large-scale ship battles.
results.name: Rebel Galaxy

results.deck: A new game from the team that made Surgeon Simulator. In I Am Bread, the player assumes the role of a piece of bread as it explores the house around it.
results.name: I Am Bread

results.deck: A follow up to Outlast from Red Barrels.
results.name: Outlast 2

results.deck: Top-down action strategy game where survivors of a plane crash must scour the tropical island they're stranded on for resources to build a seaworthy ship and find a way back to civilization.
results.name: Lost Sea

results.deck: Battlefield goes to the first World War for the first time.
results.name: Battlefield 1

results.deck: Free-to-play World War II strategy game.
results.name: Battle Islands

results.deck: Four Sided Fantasy is a 2D platformer that utilizes a "wrap around" screen effect as a gameplay mechanic.
results.name: Four Sided Fantasy

results.deck: The Castle Game is a strategy castle building game from Neptune Interactive.
results.name: The Castle Game

results.deck: Originally called Slasher Vol 1: Summer Camp, Friday the 13th: The Game is an asymmetrical multiplayer game. One player takes on the role of classic horror icon Jason Voorhees, while seven others play the role of camp counselors trying to survive and slay Jason.
results.name: Friday the 13th: The Game

results.deck: An abstract action game where the player must use a circular cursor to collect light energy while avoiding its dark counterparts by moving the cursor and changing its size.
results.name: Minutes

results.deck: A stylish sci-fi team-based first-person shooter from Blizzard in which players can choose from over 20 unique Heroes, each with their own useful set of abilities.
results.name: Overwatch

results.deck: After many years of taking the franchise in different directions, Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 5 returns the Tony Hawk series to its roots.
results.name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 5

results.deck: An interactive TV show that utilizes the Kinect and Playstation camera. Based on the Nickelodeon TV show Rabbids Invasion.
results.name: Rabbids Invasion: The Interactive TV Show

results.deck: A PlayStation 4 and Xbox One re-release of Saints Row IV that comes bundled with all of its DLC, including the Gat Out of Hell expansion pack.
results.name: Saints Row IV: Re-Elected

results.deck: Similar to Johan Sebastian Joust, this physical local multiplayer game has players trying to score points by keeping their controller in a certain position while keeping their opponents from doing the same.
results.name: Henka Twist Caper

results.deck: A fast paced 1920s themed fighting game with 10 second rounds and a three button control scheme.
results.name: Speakeasy

results.deck: Battle a dictator's forces in a fictional Mediterranean archipelago in this follow-up to the popular series from Avalanche Studios and Square-Enix.
results.name: Just Cause 3

results.deck: A fast paced "dodge 'em up" about a lone space worker, trying to get back to civilization after his ship is destroyed.
results.name: Lost Orbit

results.deck: 2D action platform game with an 80s anime inspired look and competitive local multiplayer.
results.name: Capsule Force

results.deck: A new take on Monopoly from Ubisoft.
results.name: Monopoly Family Fun Pack

results.deck: A Goonies-like adventure in which several kids must try to save the world after finding a mysterious stone.
results.name: Crossing Souls

results.deck: A compilation containing Fibbage XL, Drawful, Word Spud, Lie Swatter and You Don't Know Jack (2015).
results.name: The Jackbox Party Pack

results.deck: Sengoku Musou 4-II is an alternate take on Sengoku Musou/Samurai Warriors 4. It adds new characters, the Dream Castle mode from Sengoku Musou Chronicle 3, and different storyline events.
results.name: Samurai Warriors 4-II

results.deck: Open world adventure about a high school student who joins the journalism club as a photographer and decides to "report" on all the beautiful girls in and around the school.
results.name: Natsuiro High School: Seishun Hakusho

results.deck: A 2D gothic action indie game from Korean developer Quattro Gear.
results.name: Black Witchcraft

results.deck: A side-scrolling 3D action RPG.
results.name: Ender of Fire

results.deck: A card battle RPG from Smilegate.
results.name: Qurare: Magic Library

results.deck: A motorcycle racing game.
results.name: Motorcycle Club

results.deck: Set in 1868 London during the Industrial Revolution, players take on the role of sibling Assassins named Evie and Jacob Frye as they rally to overthrow the Templars in power. Developed by Ubisoft Québec for the PC, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One.
results.name: Assassin's Creed Syndicate

results.deck: Free to play MOBA for PlayStation consoles.
results.name: Invokers Tournament

results.deck: A 2D puzzle platformer with a large cohesive world and multiple parallel layers the player can move between.
results.name: Poncho

results.deck: A defense game where the player must build up layers of defenses around his city to defend against the giant beasts that are attacking it.
results.name: Aegis of Earth: Protonovus Assault

results.deck: The fifth numbered entry in the renowned Street Fighter series of fighting games has appeared as a PlayStation 4 and PC exclusive.
results.name: Street Fighter V

results.deck: The sequel to The Banner Saga features familiar hand-drawn art, full orchestral soundtrack, and similar gameplay to the initial entry.
results.name: The Banner Saga 2

results.deck: The 10th annual edition of The Show, and the second to appear on the PlayStation 4. Featured on the cover is LA Dodgers outfielder Yasiel Puig.
results.name: MLB 15: The Show

results.deck: An upcoming game from Giant Sparrow, following a cursed family throughout the 1900s.
results.name: What Remains of Edith Finch

results.deck: Third-person arena shooter with a hand drawn art style from David Jaffe.
results.name: Drawn to Death

results.deck: A top-down indie shooter with procedural level generation.
results.name: Enter the Gungeon

results.deck: A mysterious new game from Katamari Damacy creator Keita Takahashi.
results.name: Wattam

results.deck: A casual co-op action RPG in the Fat Princess franchise.
results.name: Fat Princess Adventures

results.deck: Post apocalyptic indie 2D action-adventure with procedural levels.
results.name: Skytorn
